author: SteveL-MSFT
body: Looks like libicu55 is latest version, but we are still using libicu52

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
The `libicu52` dependency is inherited from .NET Core itself. They target a minimum of `libicu52` and we just transitively have that dependency.

Why should we require a newer version?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Closing because we don't need to do this.

title: Move to latest libicu
